md:
giải nghĩa từ "mode" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Mode (noun) /moʊd/:
	+ Meaning: a way of doing something, a style or manner of doing something
	+ Example: "The company has changed its mode of operation to reduce costs."
	+ Related words: method, style, manner, approach

* Mode (noun) /moʊd/:
	+ Meaning: a particular type or form of something
	+ Example: "The new smartphone has several modes, including a camera mode and a video mode."
	+ Related words: type, form, kind, variety

* Mode (noun) /moʊd/:
	+ Meaning: a particular mood or atmosphere
	+ Example: "The mode of the party was festive and lively."
	+ Related words: mood, atmosphere, tone, ambiance

* Mode (verb) /moʊd/:
	+ Meaning: to adjust or set something to a particular mode or setting
	+ Example: "You need to mode the printer to print in black and white."
	+ Related words: adjust, set, configure, switch

Note: The pronunciation of "mode" is /moʊd/, with a slight emphasis on the "o" sound.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "mode" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Mode (noun) /moʊd/:

    • Meaning: a way of doing something, a style or manner of doing something
    • Example: "The company has changed its mode of operation to reduce costs."
    • Related words: method, style, manner, approach

  • Mode (noun) /moʊd/:

    • Meaning: a particular type or form of something
    • Example: "The new smartphone has several modes, including a camera mode and a video mode."
    • Related words: type, form, kind, variety

  • Mode (noun) /moʊd/:

    • Meaning: a particular mood or atmosphere
    • Example: "The mode of the party was festive and lively."
    • Related words: mood, atmosphere, tone, ambiance

  • Mode (verb) /moʊd/:

    • Meaning: to adjust or set something to a particular mode or setting
    • Example: "You need to mode the printer to print in black and white."
    • Related words: adjust, set, configure, switch

Note: The pronunciation of "mode" is /moʊd/, with a slight emphasis on the "o" sound.
